nodes.label: First Step
nodes.description: Your journey of self-improvement begins. Morning meditation, regular runs, and evening reading await.

nodes.label: Morning Clarity
nodes.description: The first week of morning meditation brings mental clarity. 7 consecutive days of mindfulness.

nodes.label: First Miles
nodes.description: Complete your first three runs this week. Your body protests but grows stronger.

nodes.label: Reading Ritual
nodes.description: Establish your evening reading ritual. 7 consecutive days of reading for 30 minutes.

nodes.label: Mind Garden
nodes.description: Two weeks of consistent meditation. Your mind feels like a garden being tended daily.

nodes.label: Breath Control
nodes.description: Your breathing techniques improve during meditation, helping you maintain focus for the full 10 minutes.

nodes.label: Runner's Zone
nodes.description: You've found your running rhythm. Complete 3 runs at a slightly faster pace than before.

nodes.label: Story World
nodes.description: You've finished your first book! The stories now live in your imagination.

nodes.label: Knowledge Rest
nodes.description: Take time to reflect on what you've read. Let the knowledge settle before moving forward.

nodes.label: Mindfulness Moment
nodes.description: A peaceful plateau in your meditation journey. Enjoy the calm as your habit solidifies.

nodes.label: Body Challenge
nodes.description: Push yourself to run 4 miles once this week in addition to your regular runs.

nodes.label: Knowledge Bridge
nodes.description: Connect ideas between different books you've read. Your reading habit is building a network of knowledge.

nodes.label: Genre Explorer
nodes.description: Try reading a different genre than usual. Expand your literary horizons.

nodes.label: Inner Sanctuary
nodes.description: One month of meditation has created a sanctuary within your mind you can access anytime.

nodes.label: Endurance Peak
nodes.description: Complete all three weekly runs without stopping. Your endurance has reached new heights.

nodes.label: Wisdom Collection
nodes.description: You've read consistently for a month. The wisdom from these books is becoming part of who you are.

nodes.label: Mind-Body Connection
nodes.description: Try mindful running - applying meditation techniques during your run. Feel the synergy between habits.

nodes.label: Reflective Reader
nodes.description: After reading, meditate on the ideas encountered. Your habits are intertwining.

nodes.label: Habit Harmony
nodes.description: You've integrated meditation, running, and reading into your life. These aren't just activities anymore - they're part of your identity.
